title: Pity me not = Without each other
creator_credit: PMN Productions, III Task Pictures, Allen Klein and Saul Swimmer
brief_description: A drama about circus life and those who are a part of the circus family - in particular, a young trapeze artist played by Tony Anthony. Cast also includes Brud Talbot, Anne Hegira, Michael Dunn, Bob White, Barbara Biggart, Ann Harris. Music composed and conducted by Dimitri Tiomkin.
